survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of smart thermostats to understand their satisfaction levels, challenges faced, and desired improvements.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your smart thermostat overall?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your smart thermostat overall?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: Which features of your smart thermostat do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections; include an 'Other' option with open-ended response.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice checkboxes with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which features of your smart thermostat do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: What challenges have you faced while using your smart thermostat?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What challenges have you faced while using your smart thermostat?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your smart thermostat to others?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring recommendation likelihood.

script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in future smart thermostat models?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather suggestions for product improvements.
